casebody.data:
Second Department,

April, 1953 *

(April 27, 1953) In the Matter of the Application of Lawrence R. Knobel, for Admission to the Bar.

Application denied upon the ground that the applicant has failed to satisfy this court that he possesses the character and general fitness requisite for an attorney and counsellor at law, as required by paragraph a of subdivision 1 of section 90 of the Judiciary Law. Present—Nolan, P. J., Carswell, Adel, Wenzel and MacCrate, JJ.
